```{julia julia-setup, include=FALSE}
using DelimitedFiles   # readdlm
using Pkg

Pkg.add("Combinatorics")
using Combinatorics    # combinations
Pkg.add("Formatting")
using Formatting       # format

here = replace(pwd(), "/vignettes" => "");
```

## Day 1: Report Repair

Link to questions [here](https://adventofcode.com/2020/day/1)

### Part 1

```{julia day1-1}
# Read in data
path = joinpath(here, "inst", "2020", "day1.txt");
dat = vec(readdlm(path));

# Find the two entries that sum to 2020
numbers = [x for x in combinations(dat, 2) if sum(x) == 2020];
numbers = reshape(numbers)[1];

# What do you get if you multiply them together?
numbers[1] * numbers[2]
```

### Part 2

```{julia day1-2}
# What is the product of the three entries that sum to 2020?
numbers = [x for x in combinations(dat, 3) if sum(x) == 2020];
numbers = reshape(numbers)[1];
ans = numbers[1] * numbers[2] * numbers[3];
format(ans)
```
